itemType.description: If this collection is a homogenous collection of records then itemType is a string of fixed value of record. If this collection is a homogenous collection of other catalogs then itemType is a string of fixed value of catalog. If this collection is a heterogenous collection of records and catalogs then itemType is a array indicated that item types of the members of this collections (i.e. record and/or catalog).

type.descripton: Fixed to catalog for collections of records and/or subordinate catalogs.

keywords.description: The topic or topics of the resource. Typically represented using free-form keywords, tags, key phrases, or classification codes.

language.description: The language used for textual values in this catalog representation.

languages.description: The list of languages in which this catalog object is available.

recordLanguages.description: The list of languages in which the records of this catalog available.

created.description: Date of creation of this catalog.

updated.description: The most recent date on which the catalog was changed.

contacts.description: A list of contacts qualified by their role(s) in association to the catalog.

themes.description: A knowledge organization system used to classify this catalog.

rights.description: A statement that concerns all rights not addressed by the license such as a copyright statement.

conformsTo.description: The extensions/conformance classes this catalog object implements.
